Class ObserverManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.network.ObserverManager
public class ObserverManager extends Object
Class that manages the notifications to the clients

    • showPoints

      public void showPoints(Map<String,Integer> points, Map<PlayerColor,String> colors)
      Notifies all registered observers to display the points and corresponding colors for each player.
      Parameters:
      points - A map where keys are player names and values are their respective points.
      colors - A map where keys are PlayerColor enum values and values are strings representing color names.
